entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Quaqtaq
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023
